sentence.Network_en: Researchers observed one bird impale a rodent on a cactus.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究人员观察到一只鸟把一只啮齿动物钉在一棵仙人掌上。

sentence.Network_en: Singing among the savage branches, it impale itself upon the longest, sharpest spine.
sentence.Network_cn: 它把自己钉在最尖最长的刺上,在蓁蓁树枝间婉啭啼鸣.

sentence.Network_en: I poisoned him, but I did not impale him on a spear!
sentence.Network_cn: 我毒死了他, 但是我没有把他插在长矛上!

list.abs: The enemies were impaled and left to die ., 许多敌人被刺中 , 最后死去.
One of the spikes impaled him ., 其中一个钉子刺穿了他.
away is useless , my arrow will still impale your brain ., 逃离是没有用的 , 我的箭依然会穿透你的脑袋.
do not push me , or i wil impale you on my horns ., 别推我 , 要不我会用我的角顶你.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'enclose with stakes or pales'): from French empaler or medieval Latin impalare, from Latin in- 'in' + palus 'a stake'

entry.def: To impale something on a pointed object means to cause the point to go into it or through it.

example.ex: Researchers observed one bird impale a rodent on a cactus...
example.tran: 研究人员观察到一只鸟把一只啮齿动物钉在一棵仙人掌上。

example.ex: Lenny swayed for a moment, then dropped to the ground, impaling himself on his switchblade...
example.tran: 伦尼晃了一下,然后倒在了地上,他的弹簧刀刺穿了自己的身体。

means.word_mean: 1. pierce with a sharp stake or point;
2. kill by piercing with a spear or sharp pole;

sentences.sentence: "the enemies were impaled and left to die"

auth_sentence.content: So he might impale a strip of soil.

auth_sentence.content: Impale them on a skewer lengthways to take out the bend.
auth_sentence.res_content: Impale them on a skewer lengthways to take out the bend.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Impale them on a skewer lengthways to take out the bend.

auth_sentence.content: Pockmarks in the walls spoke of her many attempts to impale me with her shoes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pockmarks in the walls spoke of her many attempts to impale me with her shoes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pockmarks in the walls spoke of her many attempts to impale me with her shoes.

sentences.en: He fell out of the window and was impaled on the iron railings.
sentences.cn: 他从窗口跌下去, 身体被铁栏杆刺穿了。
